author: Adam Dixon
comment: It works for about 5 seconds but then keeps failing on my lg g watch r

author: ernie carino
comment: This was a nice feature untill it stopped working. I uninstalled it and reinstalled it and still does not work. This is not worth it if it stops working. This was on the note edge. I will change this review once this problem is repaired. Also very hard to contact the programmer to let them know about this problem because i do not use facebook.

reply.author: Daragon Technology
reply.content: Hi there! We have updated the watch face, it now works with the new Android Wear!

title: Stopped working all of a sudden

author: Joseph Jerrytone
comment: Just what I've been looking for. Now please make some similar ones so I can switch it up. Something more like Stuhrling watches.

reply.author: Daragon Technology
reply.content: I just took a look at Stuhrling. Their watches are absolutely beautiful!!! I will do my best! :)
